name: Galactic Mail demo
description:
GALACTIC MAIL.

davideobros.
https://twitter.com/davideotube

You play an intergalactic postman who has to deliver mail to a number of inhabited moons.
He must safely head from moon to moon and at the same time avoid the dangerous asteroids.
The postman is paid for every order he delivers, but if he hangs too long on the mane, a sum is deducted.

CONTROL'S/DISPLAY
Launch the rocket with the space bar. When the rocket lands on a moon, a launch direction can be determined with the arrow keys.
you can now launch to the next moon by pressing the space bar after which the moon disappears from the screen to indicate that the mail is delivered there. If you and / or objects dissapear on one side of the screen, they will appear again on the other side.
